EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to Multi notifying of expiration.
EmailTemplate.name: Renewal Multi #1 @ –90 Days: Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Compliance Week corporate membership is expiring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Subscription_Contact__c},
We would like to thank you for your continued support. We truly value you as a member of the Compliance Week community. Your involvement is extremely important to us and very much appreciated.
We wanted to take this time to remind you that your membership to Compliance Week will expire on {!Opportunity.CloseDate}. In addition to unlimited access to ComplianceWeek.com, here’s a reminder of the exclusive benefits provided to you as a corporate member:
Print and digital magazine; Quarterly data-centric research & case studies; Preferred consideration for event speaking; Quarterly premium-members-only webcasts; Branded reprints.
As an additional bonus, we have included one free admission to our annual Compliance Week conference, now in its 15th year. We welcome all comments and suggestions. Your feedback helps us create a better experience for you and all of the members of the Compliance Week community.
Thank you!
Angela Ruggiero Compliance Week
Accounts Payable Compliance Week 129 Portland St Fl 6 Boston MA 02114-2014 Call (617) 570-8608
